name: SHRI UGAM EDUCATION TRUST
briefDescription: a.  	Maximum Students Studying in our institution are belonging to economically & Socially backward class.b.  	We would like to highlight here that around 600 students were benefited by the trust during the last three years. It means average 200 students in a year were benefited by the trust. And it is expected that after implementation of said project average no. of students will be more than 400 students in a year.c.	We would like to highlight that our trust is mainly focusing on the students from economically and socially backward area.
